section.title: JHotDraw 7
section.para: JHotDraw 7 is a complete rewrite of the JHotDraw 6 framework. It is not compatible with prior versions of the framework.

listitem.para: Provides an application framework for document-based applications
A figure, which depends on the state of other figures, automatically updates its state.
The code makes use of Java 5 language features and the Java 5 SE API.
The framework is built on top of the Java Swing and Java AWT class libraries and their design principles.
Mini usage studies of the framework 'Mini'

section.para: JHotDraw 7 was developed by Werner Randelshofer.
